title: Crime Alert 10.19.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.19.21
description:
Mom charged in the death of her special needs daughter. Would-be thief arrested for robbery with a deadly weapon after using a knife to try to steal a Snickers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
